info.name: OED
info.description: This collection contains API requests for OED.

item.name: conversion_segments

request.description:
## Purpose

---

To add a new conversion segment, it must span all time (âˆ’infinity to infinity), and no other segment for that conversion can exist.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| weekPatternsId | integer | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Edit a conversion segment.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| weekPatternsId | integer | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| note | string | no |
| originalStartTime | string | yes |
| originalEndTime | string | yes |
## This route will be removed in the near future.

## Purpose 

---

Retrieve all conversion segment objects associated with the source meter id and destination meter id.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |

Retrieve a specific conversion segment object.

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Delete the specified conversion segment after updating the end time of the previous conversion segment, ensuring the conversion segments span all time.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Delete the specified conversion segment after updating the start time of the following conversion segment, ensuring the conversion segments span all time.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Split the specified conversion segment into two. The earlier segment uses the new slope, intercept, pattern, and note.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| newWeekPatternsId | integer | no |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Split the specified conversion segment into two. The later segment uses the new slope, intercept, pattern, and note.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| newWeekPatternsId | integer | no |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | string | yes |

item.description: The **conversion_segments** folder contains API requests for managing time-varying conversion segments in the system. Segments for the same conversion must cover the entire timespan from `-infinity` to `infinity` without gaps or overlaps.

item.name: day_patterns

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Obtain all day pattern objects.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Purpose

---

Obtain a specific day pattern object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Saturday",
    "note": "Test: insert day pattern.",
    "slope": 3,
    "intercept": 0.75,
    "segmentNote": "Test: insert default daySegment from inserting day pattern."
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Add a new day and the default day segment associated with it.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | string | yes |
| note | string | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| segmentNote | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Edit a day pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| name | string | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Delete a day pattern. All day segments associated with it will also be deleted.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |

item.description: The **day_patterns** folder contains API requests for managing day patterns. A day pattern is a collection of day segments that together cover all 24 hours of a day.

item.name: day_segments

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Retrieve all day segment objects associated with a specific day pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |

response.name: before update
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 12,
        "dayId": 5,
        "startHour": 0,
        "endHour": 8,
        "slope": -1,
        "intercept": 1.75,
        "note": "Test: insert first 1/3 of day"
    },
    {
        "id": 13,
        "dayId": 5,
        "startHour": 8,
        "endHour": 16,
        "slope": -2,
        "intercept": 1.75,
        "note": "Test: insert second 1/3 of day"
    },
    {
        "id": 14,
        "dayId": 5,
        "startHour": 16,
        "endHour": 24,
        "slope": -3,
        "intercept": 1.75,
        "note": "Test: insert last 1/3 of day"
    }
]

response.name: after update mid segment time
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 12,
        "dayId": 5,
        "startHour": 0,
        "endHour": 6,
        "slope": -1,
        "intercept": 1.75,
        "note": "Test: insert first 1/3 of day"
    },
    {
        "id": 13,
        "dayId": 5,
        "startHour": 6,
        "endHour": 17,
        "slope": -3,
        "intercept": 2.75,
        "note": "Test: update second 1/3 of day"
    },
    {
        "id": 14,
        "dayId": 5,
        "startHour": 17,
        "endHour": 24,
        "slope": -3,
        "intercept": 1.75,
        "note": "Test: insert last 1/3 of day"
    }
]

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Retrieve a specific day segment object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

To add a new day segment, it must span all time (0 to 24), and no other segment for that day pattern can exist.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Edit a pre-existing day segment object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| note | string | no |
| originalStartHour | number | yes |
| originalEndHour | number | yes |
## This route will be removed in the near future.

## Purpose

---

Delete a day segment after updating the start time of the following day segment to ensure full time coverage.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |

response.name: cannot delete later with end 24
response.body: Got request to delete later day segment with invalid data, error(s): instance.endHour must be less than or equal to 23

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Delete a day segment after updating the end time of the previous time segment to ensure full time coverage.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |

response.name: cannot delete earlier with start 0
response.body: Got request to delete earlier day segment with invalid data, error(s): instance.startHour must be greater than or equal to 1

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Split the specified day segment into two. The earlier segment uses the new slope, intercept, and note.

| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | number | yes |

## Purpose

---

Split the specified day segment into two. The later segment uses the new slope, intercept, and note.

## Authorization

This request requires admin authentication.

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | number | yes |

item.description: The **day_segments** folder contains API requests for managing time-varying day segments in the system. Segments for the same conversion must cover the entire timespan from 0 to 24 without gaps or overlaps.

item.name: week_patterns

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Get all week pattern objects.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

response.name: get all
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "Default Week",
        "note": "testing adding a new week",
        "sunday": 2,
        "monday": 2,
        "tuesday": 3,
        "wednesday": 4,
        "thursday": 4,
        "friday": 5,
        "saturday": 6
    },
    {
        "id": 3,
        "name": "Second Week",
        "note": "testing adding a new week",
        "sunday": 2,
        "monday": 2,
        "tuesday": 3,
        "wednesday": 5,
        "thursday": 6,
        "friday": 3,
        "saturday": 4
    }
]

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Returns a specific week pattern object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Add a new week pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | string | yes |
| note | string | no |
| sunday | integer | yes |
| monday | integer | yes |
| tuesday | integer | yes |
| wednesday | integer | yes |
| thursday | integer | yes |
| friday | integer | yes |
| saturday | integer | yes |

## Purpose

---

Delete a week pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |

item.description: The **week_patterns** folder contains API requests for managing week patterns. A week pattern is a collection of day patterns that together cover all 7 days of the week.

item.name: conversions

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Returns all conversion objects.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

### Example Response

``` json
[
    {
        "id": "1",
        "type": "currency",
        "value": "100",
        "timestamp": "2023-10-01T12:00:00Z"
    },
    {
        "id": "2",
        "type": "unit",
        "value": "50",
        "timestamp": "2023-10-01T12:05:00Z"
    }
]

 ```

body.raw:
{ 
    "sourceId": 5,
    "destinationId": 3,
    "bidirectional": false,
    "slope": 3,
    "intercept": 1.2,
    "segmentNote": "Testing inserting conversion -> inserting default conversion segment.",
    "note": "Testing inserting conversion."
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Add a new conversion and the default conversion segment associated with it.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| bidirectional | boolean | yes |
| note | string | no |
| weekPatternsId | number | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| segmentNote | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Edit a conversion.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| bidirectional | boolean | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Delete a conversion and all conversion segments associated with it.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |

item.description: The **conversions** folder contains API requests for managing unit conversions. A conversion defines the relationship between two units (source and destination). Each conversion can have one or more associated conversion segments that specify how the conversion varies over time.

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Authenticates users and returns a JSON Web Token with their user ID.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| username | string | yes |
| password | string | yes |
